item.description:
We are dedicated to advancing the cause of liberty and one issue we feel particularly strong about is our constitutional right to bear arms which is why we are encouraging as many people as possible to go to this.

There is going to be a two hour panel discussion about gun violence, safety, and ownership this coming Thursday, the 21st from 6:30-9pm. Some of the panelists include Holiston Police Chief John Moore as well as ANTI-GUN Democratic Representative David Linsky who recently filed for a bill that would prohibit assault weapons from being stored in homes and requiring applicants to disclose mental health records.

A link to the event is as follows:

http://www.metrowestdailynews.com/news/x898141998/Holliston-Democrats-to-host-gun-discussion-March-21#ixzz2NDD78ZVf

To find out more about Representative Linsky and his bill:

http://www.metrowestdailynews.com/news/x1503801977/Linsky-outlines-his-own-gun-control-bill

Lets try to get as many people as possible to this event to voice our opposition. It is very important that people go and make sure their voice is heard. WE NEED TO STOP DANGEROUS LEGISLATION LIKE THIS DEAD IN ITS TRACKS!!!!

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: GUN PANEL DISCUSSION WITH ANTI-GUN REPRESENTATIVE DAVID LINSKY!
